original_text: Surely you remember, brothers and sisters, our toil and hardship; we worked night and day in order not to be a burden to anyone while we preached the gospel of God to you.
korean_text: 형제들아 우리의 수고와 애쓴 것을 너희가 기억하리니 너희 아무에게도 폐를 끼치지 아니하려고 밤낮으로 일하면서 너희에게 하나님의 복음을 전하였노라

sentences.original_text: Surely you remember, brothers and sisters
sentences.korean_translation: 형제 자매여, 분명히 여러분은 기억할 것입니다

sentences.original_text: in order not to be a burden to anyone
while we preached the gospel of God to you
